title: The Sokal Squared Hoax and Researcher Misconduct
dc:creator: Queens Podcast Lab
description: Joe, Leslie, Gabriel, and Brian McCabe (Georgetown University) discuss recent charges against Portland State philosopher Peter Boghossian for researcher misconduct for failing to clear his Sokal Squared hoax with his school's institutional review board.
